intro: Gaertnera psychotrioides, commonly known as the psychotrioides plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale pink. Its leaves are typically opposite and have a smooth, waxy texture. Gaertnera psychotrioides is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and undergrowth.
